data.title: Meet Our Team
data.text:
Hien Kim

Director of Sale

Hello! My name is Hien Kim. I was born in the peaceful countryside part of Hanoi. I am very happy to provide and share with anyone who loves travel all the information about Indochina tourism such as famous attractions, hotels, cruises, travel tips, etc. BestPrice Travel provides me with a great environment to express my knowledge, ideas and friendly colleagues feel like a family to me.

Hang Moon

Sale Manager

Warmest greeting from BestPrice Travel! My name is Hang "Moon". Firstly, I would like to give a short introduction about myself. I studied at Hanoi Open University, Faculty of Tourism and have been working in BestPrice Travel since I graduated. I am very happy to deal with and take care of customers during tour. We hope to bring the most truly experiences from exciting journeys or destinations. I love my work!

Rosie Nguyen

Travel Consultant

Hi everyone, I am Rosie Nguyen. My passion is traveling all around Vietnam and other countries so that reason why I really love to work in Tourism companies, especially is Best Price Travel, one of the best travel agencies in Indochina.

Janet Tran

Travel Consultant

Welcome my friends, I'm Janet from the crowded city named Ho Chi Minh. Cultivating my knowledge and experience about traveling is my goal to support customers. I will greet you with enthusiasm and devotion. Hope u have a memorable time with Bestprice Travel.

Huyen Anh (Anna)

Travel Consultant

Hello everyone, I'm Anna from the sunny and windy Central Highlands. My dream is to travel to many places. I want to discover new lands, new people and the local culture of every country. Furthermore, enjoying delicious food is my ambition in life. I hope that can share those interesting experiences with visitors. Welcome to Vietnam, my friends

Jane Pham

Travel Consultant

Hi there! My name is Jane and I am glad to be a part of BestPrice Travel Team. My dream is traveling around the world and share my strong passion of Vietnam cultures and cuisine to our clients. Becoming a travel consultant is a great opportunity for me to make the unforgettable time in Vietnam and Indochina countries. I hope you have a great time with us - Best Price Travel Agent

Giulia Trieu

Travel Consultant

Xin chào! It’s Giulia here. Like someone already said “It is better to see something once than to hear about it a thousand times”. Yes it really is. I feel so lucky to be born in a Southeast Asia country (Vietnam) so that I can see magnificent places here and enjoy delicious “Michelin street foods”. And now I’m ready to show you everything, how about you? Are you ready to explore the mysterious Southeast Asia?

Mia Nguyen

Travel Consultant

Xin chào các b?n! My name is Mia Nguyen, I live in Ho Chi Minh City - a financial city of Vietnam with the busyness and gorgeousness. As someone said: "The moment when you reach the places you want, admiring all the stunning view in sight. At that moment, you will realize all your efforts were extremely worthy." So I really hope I can have a chance to bring the best experience to you. Best Price - Best Service!!

Haley Luong

Travel Consultant

Hi, welcome to our beautiful Vietnam! You can call me Haley. With my passion for traveling, I will be your companion on the journey of discovering our country. Do not hesitate to contact me and I will make your trips memorable!

Trang Nguyen

Operation Executive

My colleagues call me is Trang Min. I’m tour operator at BestPrice Travel. With me, your satisfaction is my responsibility and happiness. Welcome to Vietnam, The country you can’t miss in your journey of discovery.

Huyen Tran

Operation Executive

Hello! My name is Huyen Tran, and I would be happy to introduce myself. As a tour operator, I am responsible for planning, organizing, and managing tours for clients. This includes coordinating transportation, accommodations, activities, and other logistics to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for travelers. I am passionate about creating memorable and well-organized tours.

Minh Dao (Kiju)

Marketing Manager

Hi there! Minh, Ming, and Min are all me. I studied Tourism and Marketing, and my life is always about traveling. So now I'm here, living the days of a tourism marketer. All you can see and read on Bestpricetravel.com are our marketing team effort created by our traveling experience with footprints throughout Southeast Asia and our understanding of international travelers' concerns. If you have any questions about this area, "ping" me, I and my team will try our best to give you the best answer!

Hong Nhung

Marketing Executive

Welcome to Vietnam! I'm Hong Nhung, a Marketing Content Writer in BestPrice Travel. I'm kind of introverted and eager to learn new things. And traveling is the best way to broaden my mind. That's the reason why I'm really keen on sharing my knowledge and experiences of traveling throughout Vietnam as well as the Indochina region. It's my pleasure to guide you on learning about new cultures in the world.

Tri Dung

Marketing Executive

Welcome to BestPrice Travel, where creativity meets innovation! I'm Dung, a designer at BestPrice Travel. With a keen eye for aesthetics and a passion for creating visually captivating content, crafting compelling marketing materials is my major hobby. From stunning graphics to engaging visuals, I strive to deliver designs that leave a lasting impression on every viewer.

Hoang Huan

Marketing Executive

Hi, I'm Hoang Huan, a content writer in the Marketing Department of BestPrice Travel and a typical guy who loves learning new things. I’m so eager to share the beauty of my home country through my stories. May my guides bring something valuable for you, travelers!

Thanh Hang

Marketing Executive

My dear, as a member of the Marketing Department, I am passionate about showing the beauty, diversity, and hidden gems of our destinations. Through innovative marketing strategies and responsible travel practices, we aim to inspire and ignite your wanderlust, inviting you to explore the wonders of Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Thailand, Myanmar, and beyond.

Thuy Nguyen

Accounting Executive

Hi, my name is Thuy. I was grew up in a beautiful and peaceful city of Vietnam - Hanoi. I am an accountant of BestPrice Travel. Working with my colleagues here is one of the most excellent thing I have and my favorite quote is "Nothing is impossible".

Rick Nguyen

Tour Guide

Hello, my name is Rick, travel consultant of Bestprice Travel. I like to travel to learn about new thing and would like share my love with everyone from all around the world. Have fun.
